problem_text: In the figure, \triangle F G H is a right triangle with hypotenuse F H and G J = G H. What is the measure of \angle J G H?
compact_text: In the figure, \triangle FGH is a right triangle with hypotenuse FH and GJ = GH. What is the measure of \angle JGH?
annotat_text: In the figure, $\triangle FGH$ is a right triangle with hypotenuse $\overline{FH}$ and $GJ = GH$. What is the measure of $∠JGH$?
